short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays all images and videos on the page with download buttons

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick Media Downloader is a versatile Chrome extension designed to make downloading media files from the web a breeze. With this extension, you can quickly access and download images, videos, and audio files directly from any webpage.

Features:
One-Click Media Overlay: Easily toggle a media overlay that displays all media files on the current webpage.
Download Media Files: Download images, videos, and audio files with a single click.
Customizable View: Filter media by type (images, videos, or audio) and view detailed information about each file.
User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a sleek and intuitive interface that integrates seamlessly with your browsing experience.
Custom Scrollbars: Aesthetic and functional custom scrollbars for easy navigation through media content.

How to Use:
Open and Close the Overlay: Click the Quick Media Downloader icon in the Chrome toolbar to toggle the media overlay.
Filter Media: Use the sidebar to filter and display specific types of media files.
Download Files: Click the "Download" button next to any media file to save it to your device.

Why You'll Love It:
Efficiency: Quickly find and download media without leaving the webpage.
Simplicity: No complex settings or configurations â€“ just install and start downloading.
Compatibility: Works on all webpages, making it the ultimate tool for media enthusiasts, researchers, and content creators.

Install Quick Media Downloader today and take control of your media downloads with ease and efficiency!
